Its a great game in my opinion, better with friends i can only play a couple ranked matches solo before i get bored but overall i have had a great experience with the game i rarely see hackers in game so if you got the money i would get the prime otherwise you will have nothing but spinbotters and wallers messing up your experience

man, cs go foi um dos melhores jogos que eu já joguei ate hj por tanto tenho ate 3 contas prime. Recomendo de mais esse jogo o preço ta salgado ? sim ta mais foi o melhor gasto que eu ja tive. só que recomendo não jogar no modo gratuito pois lá eles ussa muitos programa e etc

I mean its CS:GO, does it really need reviews at this point? Anyways, at the start playing casual is really annoying, especially when you're first starting, however, stick with it, learn one or two maps, and build yourself up from there, definitely worth the price, get some friends to make a full team of five, lots of fun.
Great Game! Especially With Friends. 10/10 Would Rush B Again!
